src_original: yaś ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ,  yā ca hitaiṣitā,  yā ca mahāmaitrī,  yā ca mahākaruṇā,  ye ca aprameyāsaṃkhyeyā buddhaguṇāḥ,  yaṃ ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti,
tgt_original: 乃至法滅已來，於其中間所有諸佛世尊諸波羅蜜多相應善根，及彼諸佛戒、定、慧、解脫、解脫知見諸蘊善根，乃至大慈大悲無量無邊利益安樂，一切眾生佛功德聚，及佛所說種種法門。

src_original: ye ca tasmin dharme śikṣante 'dhimokṣayanti pratitiṣṭhanti,  teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlāni,
tgt_original: 一切眾生於是中學信解安住所有善根。

src_original: yāṃś ca te buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvān mahāsattvān vyākurvanti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,  teṣāṃ ca yāni ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāni,
tgt_original: 及佛世尊為諸菩薩授阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記，是諸菩薩所有六波羅蜜多相應善根。

src_original: āsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /  sacetpunarasyaivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā imāṃ sarvajñatāmāhariṣyati,  ityevaṃ saṃjānīte,
tgt_original: 若菩薩摩訶薩作是念： 『此是般若波羅蜜多，此名般若波羅蜜多，學是般若波羅蜜多故當得一切智。

src_original: yāṃś ca te buddhā bhagavantaḥ pratyekabuddhayānikān pudgalān vyākurvanti pratyekabodhau,
tgt_original: 又復為諸緣覺乘人授緣覺記，而彼所有一切善根。

src_original: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlāni,  yāni ca śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ dānamayāni kuśalamūlāni śīlamayāni kuśalamūlāni bhāvanāmayāni kuśalamūlāni,  yāni ca śaikṣāṇyanāsravāṇi kuśalamūlāni,  yāni ca aśaikṣāṇyanāsravāṇi kuśalamulāni,
tgt_original: 又復有諸聲聞乘人，行於布施、持戒、修定所有善根，及諸有學無漏、無學無漏如是善根。

src_original: ye ca tasmin dharme pṛthagjanāḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti,
tgt_original: 又復所有諸愚異生所種善根。

src_original: ye ca devānāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā manuṣyāmanuṣyā vā taṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti,
tgt_original: 乃至天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、，緊那羅，摩睺羅伽、人及非人，傍生異類，聞佛說法所種善根。

src_original: bhagavatāṃ chinnavartmanāṃ chinnavartmanīnāṃ chinnaprapañcabhavanetrīkāṇāmaprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāmaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu  trisāhasra mahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyamāṇānāṃ yāpayatāṃ yāvatprathamacittotpādamupādāya  yāvacca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante,  yāvacca nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvānti,  yāvacca saddharmo nāntardadhāti,  etasminnantare yāni teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāni,
tgt_original: 是諸菩薩，於十方一切處無量無數三千大千世界，一一世界中所有過去無量無數已入涅槃諸佛如來——是諸如來從初發心乃至成就阿耨多羅三藐三菩提果，已入無餘依大涅槃界——乃至法滅已來，於其中間所有諸佛世尊諸波羅蜜多相應善根，及彼種種福行善根，諸佛戒、定、慧、解脫、解脫知見諸蘊善根，乃至大慈大悲無量無邊利益安樂一切眾生佛功德聚，及佛所說種種法門。

src_original: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlāni,  yāṃś ca te buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvān mahāsattvān vyākurvanti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,  teṣāṃ ca yāni ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāni,
tgt_original: 及佛世尊為諸菩薩授阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記，是諸菩薩所有六波羅蜜多相應善根。

src_original: yāṃś ca te buddhā bhagavantaḥ pratyekabuddhayānikān pudgalān vyākurvanti pratyekabodhau,
tgt_original: 又復為諸緣覺乘人授緣覺記，而彼所有一切善根。

src_original: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlāni,  yāni ca śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ dānamayāni kuśalamūlāni śīlamayāni kuśalamūlāni bhāvanāmayāni kuśalamūlāni,  yāni ca śaikṣāṇyanāsravāṇi kuśalamūlāni,  yāni ca aśaikṣāṇyanāsravāṇi kuśalamulāni,
tgt_original: 又復有諸聲聞乘人，行於布施、持戒、修定所有功德，及諸有學無漏，無學無漏如是善根。

src_original: ye ca tasmin dharme pṛthagjanāḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti,  ye ca devānāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā manuṣyāmanuṣyā vā taṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti,  śrutvā ca kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti,  ye ca tiryagyonigatā api sattvāstaṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti,  śrutvā ca kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti,
tgt_original: 又復所有諸愚異生所種善根，乃至天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、人及非人，傍生異類，聞佛說法所種善根。

src_original: ye ca teṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu parinirvāyatsu parinirvṛteṣu ca kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti,
tgt_original: 乃至如來入涅槃後，一切眾生所種善根。

src_original: teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ yāni kuśalamulāni,  tāni sarvāṇyekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumoditavyāni /
tgt_original: 如是等種種善根、種種功德，和合聚集稱計較量。 是諸菩薩一一隨喜，以此隨喜功德，迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。 慈氏！

src_original: anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayato  bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kathaṃ na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati?
tgt_original: 若菩薩摩訶薩作如是迴向，云何當得不墮想顛倒、心顛倒、見顛倒？ 」爾時，慈氏菩薩告尊者須菩提言：

src_original: sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvo yena cittena yatpariṇāmayati,  tasmiṃścitte na cittasaṃjñī bhavati /  evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati - yathā taccittaṃ na saṃjānīte idaṃ taccittamiti /
tgt_original: 「若菩薩摩訶薩所用心隨喜及迴向時，於是心中不生心想，如實知心無所取相。

src_original: evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /
tgt_original: 若菩薩摩訶薩能以如是隨喜功德，迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提者，是菩薩摩訶薩即得不墮想、心、見倒。

src_original: atha yena cittena yatpariṇāmayati taccittaṃ saṃjānīte idaṃ taccittamiti cittasaṃjñī bhavati /  evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃjñāviparyāsaścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /
tgt_original: 若復於心不如實知，以有得想而迴向者，是菩薩摩訶薩不能遠離想、心、見倒。

src_original: sacetpunarbodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaccittaṃ pariṇāmayati,  taccittamevaṃ saṃjānīte evaṃ samanvāharati - taccittaṃ samanvāhriyamāṇameva kṣīṇaṃ kṣīṇamityevaṃ saṃjānīte,  niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇatamityevaṃ saṃjānīte /
tgt_original: 又復，若諸菩薩摩訶薩以有得心而迴向者，是心即盡即滅即離，彼盡滅心不能迴向。

src_original: tasyāpi cittasya saiva dharmatā /  yair api dharmaiḥ pariṇāmyate,  saiva dharmatā /
tgt_original: 若法如是迴向故，即法性亦然；

src_original: yeṣv api dharmeṣu pariṇāmyate,  teṣām api dharmāṇāṃ saiva dharmateti /  sacedevaṃ pariṇāmayati,  samyakpariṇāmayati,
tgt_original: 法性如是迴向故，即諸法亦然。

src_original: na mithyā pariṇāmayati /  evaṃ ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pariṇāmayitavyam //  punaraparamārya subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ  bhagavatāṃ chinnavartmanāṃ chinnavartmanīnāṃ chinnaprapañcabhavanetrīkāṇāmaprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ  yāvatprathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvacca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbhotsyante
tgt_original: 若菩薩摩訶薩能如是迴向者，是為正迴向，不名邪迴向。

src_original: teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ yāni kuśalamūlāni,  ye ca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirbodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,  teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ yāni kuśalamūlāni,
tgt_original: 若菩薩摩訶薩如過去諸佛，善根如是隨喜迴向。

src_original: ye ca pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca pratyekabodhau,  teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ yāni kuśalamūlāni,
tgt_original: 若於未來諸佛道悉已修習，已滅戲論得大善利。

src_original: śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttamayā asamayā asamasamayā anumodanayā anumodeta /  evamanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayāmīti vācaṃ bhāṣeta - anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakaṃ bhavatviti /  tasya kathaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati?
tgt_original: 若能如是隨喜功德，迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提者，是菩薩即得不墮想、心、見倒。 若復以其有所得心而迴向者，是菩薩不能遠離想、心、見倒。 而彼菩薩摩訶薩當如實知所用心迴向時，是心即盡即滅即離，彼盡滅心即不能迴向。

src_original: sacetpariṇāmayan evaṃ samanvāharati - te dharmāḥ kṣīṇā niruddhā vigatā vipariṇatāḥ,  sa ca dharmo 'kṣayo yatra pariṇāmyate ityevaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ (Vaidya 76)  samyaksaṃbodhau /
tgt_original: 若以無所得心而迴向者，是即如實迴向法性。 若法如是迴向故，即法性亦然；

src_original: sacetpunarevamupaparīkṣate - na dharmo dharmaṃ pariṇāmayati,
tgt_original: 法性如是迴向故，即諸法亦然。

src_original: ity api pariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /  evaṃ bhadantaṃ subhūte pariṇāmayato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /
tgt_original: 若菩薩摩訶薩於如是過去未來現在法中，能如實知、如實迴向者，是為正迴向，不名邪迴向。 「復次，須菩提！ 菩薩摩訶薩若欲如實迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提者，當觀諸法猶如虛空，離一切相。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: tathā hi sa tāṃ pariṇāmanāṃ nābhiniviśate /  sacetpunarevaṃ saṃjānīte - na cittaṃ cittaṃ jānāti,  na dharmo dharmaṃ jānāti,
tgt_original: 若於諸法如實了知，即無心、無非心是能知者，無法、無非法為所知相。

src_original: ity api pariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye /  ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuttaraḥ pariṇāmaḥ /  sacetpunarbodhisattvastaṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ saṃjānīte,  na pariṇāmayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
tgt_original: 若菩薩於如是法中能迴向者，是名最上迴向，是故得名菩薩摩訶薩正修福行。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: tathā hi sa tāṃ pariṇāmanāmabhiniviśate /  sacetpunarasyaivaṃ bhavati - so 'pi puṇyābhisaṃskāro viviktaḥ śāntaḥ,  yadapyanumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu tad api viviktaṃ śāntamiti pariṇāmayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
tgt_original: 若種種法及種種行皆寂靜故，所有隨喜功德迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提亦復如是。

src_original: sacedevam api na saṃjānīte - sarvasaṃskārāḥ śāntā viviktā iti,  evamiyaṃ tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā yad api tatteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ kuśalamūlam /  yādṛśa eva sa pariṇāmastādṛśameva tatkuśalamūlam,  yenāpi tatpariṇāmitaṃ tad api tajjātikaṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ tannikāyaṃ tatsvabhāvam /  sacedevaṃ saṃjānīte,  na pariṇāmayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
tgt_original: 若如實知諸行皆寂無所動者，是菩薩摩訶薩即能具足般若波羅蜜多方便，於佛世尊入涅槃後所有善根——若體、若相、若自性、若法性——皆如實知，即能迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: atha tām api prajñāpāramitāṃ na saṃjānīte - iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā,  asya vā prajñāpāramitā sarvajñatāmāhariṣyatīti vā,
tgt_original: 若如是分別者，不名修學般若波羅蜜多。

src_original: sarvadharmānimittataḥ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /  sarvadharmanirvedhataḥ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /  sarvadharmaprakṛtipariśuddhitaḥ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /  sarvadharmāvacanataḥ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
tgt_original: 一切法無量，當知般若波羅蜜多亦如是。 一切法無相，當知般若波羅蜜多亦如是。 一切法是通達相，當知般若波羅蜜多亦如是。 一切法自性清淨，當知般若波羅蜜多亦如是。 一切法寂默，當知般若波羅蜜多亦如是。

src_original: yaccātītaṃ tatkṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇatam,
tgt_original: 若過去世，彼法已離、已滅、已盡；

src_original: yadapyanāgataṃ tadapyasaṃprāptam,
tgt_original: 若未來世，當所未至；

src_original: yacca nopalabhyate tannaiva nimittaṃ na viṣayaḥ /  sacedevaṃ nimittīkaroti,
tgt_original: 若現在世，今即無住，復無所得，非境界相。

src_original: na samanvāharati na pariṇāmayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /  atha smṛtivaikalyena na nimittīkaroti na samanvāharati na manasi karoti smṛtivaikalyādanavabodhādvā,  evam api na pariṇāmayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
tgt_original: 若取相者，即於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提住不平等邪念相應，生疑惑想，不能安住正念正意，邪所思覺，如是即不名迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。

src_original: atha tannimitaṃ samanvāharati,  na ca nimittīkaroti,  evaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati tatkuśalamūlaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
tgt_original: 若菩薩摩訶薩於諸善根無所取相、無所得心，以是心迴向者，是為迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。

src_original: sarvadharmāṇāmanirodhataḥ prahāṇasamatayā prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /  sarvadharmāṇāṃ nirvāṇaprāptitastathatāsamatayā prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
tgt_original: 一切法無滅同於斷，當知般若波羅蜜多亦如是。 一切法得涅槃同真如，當知般若波羅蜜多亦如是。

src_original: evamatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyam - idaṃ tadbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 如是迴向法，菩薩應當學。 若如是學者，彼能具足善巧方便。

src_original: yenopāyakauśalena kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayati,  sa āsannaḥ sarvajñatāyāḥ /
tgt_original: 若諸善根有是善巧方便而用迴向者，即得近一切智。

src_original: atra copāyakauśalaṃ śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyameva prajñāpāramitā  abhīkṣṇaṃ śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā  deśayitavyā upadeṣṭavyā uddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā paripraśnīkartavyā /  tatkasya hetoḥ?

tgt_original: 若善男子、善女人，樂欲速證阿耨多羅三藐三菩提果，成就最上樂者，是故應當於此般若波羅蜜多，發猛利心聽受讀誦。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: sacet imān manasikārānidaṃ copāyakauśalyamanāgamya na jānanti - kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā,
tgt_original: 若菩薩摩訶薩於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提有所退轉者，是菩薩摩訶薩即不能成就如是善巧方便，亦不能知： 云何是菩薩摩訶薩行般若波羅蜜多？

src_original: tathā hi sa evaṃ jñāsyati - atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran śikṣitaḥ /
tgt_original: 是善男子、善女人應作是念： 『此般若波羅蜜多，如來、應供、正等正覺往昔修菩薩行時亦如是學，我今亦學是般若波羅蜜多，此般若波羅蜜多是我所師。

src_original: atha khalu yāni tāni catvāriṃśaddevaputrasahasrāṇi śakreṇa devānāmindreṇa sārdhaṃ saṃnipatitāni tasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitānyabhūvan,  tāni śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocan - udgṛhṇīṣva mārṣa prajñāpāramitām /
tgt_original: 」爾時，先從帝釋天主同來會者，四十千天子眾，俱白帝釋天主言：

src_original: udgrahītavyā mārṣa prajñāpāramitā /  dhārayitavyā mārṣa prajñāpāramitā /  vācayitavyā mārṣa prajñāpāramitā /  paryavāptavyā mārṣa prajñāpāramitā /  pravartayitavyā mārṣa prajñāpāramitā /  deśayitavyā mārṣa prajñāpāramitā /  upadeṣṭavyā mārṣa prajñāpāramitā /  uddeṣṭavyā mārṣa prajñāpāramitā /  svādhyātavyā mārṣa prajñāpāramitā /
tgt_original: 「今當於此甚深般若波羅蜜多法門，受持讀誦記念思惟，如說修行。

src_original: atha khalu bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindramāmantrayate sma - udgṛhāṇa tvaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitām /
tgt_original: 」是時，世尊即告帝釋天主言：

src_original: dhāraya tvaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitām /  vācaya tvaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitām /  paryavāpnuhi tvaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitām /  pravartaya tvaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitām /  deśaya tvaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitām /  upadiśa tvaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitām /  uddiśaya tvaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitām /  svādhyāya tvaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitām /
tgt_original: 「憍尸迦！ 如諸天言，汝當於此般若波羅蜜多法門，受持讀誦記念思惟，如說修行。

src_original: tatkasya heto?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: yadā hi kauśika asurāṇāmevaṃrūpāḥ samudācārā utpatsyante - devāṃstrāyastriṃśān yodhayiṣyāma iti,  devaistrāyastriṃśaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmayiṣyāma iti,  tadā tvaṃ kauśika imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāhareḥ,
tgt_original: 憍尸迦！ 若阿修羅與彼三十三天子眾共相鬪戰，是時汝當思念於此般若波羅蜜多法門，彼阿修羅即當退屈而自隱沒。

src_original: svādhyāyeḥ,  evaṃ teṣāmasurāṇāṃ te samudācārāḥ punarevāntardhāsyanti //  evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - mahāvidyeyaṃ bhagavan yaduta prajñāpāramitā /  apramāṇeyaṃ bhagavan vidyā yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
tgt_original: 」帝釋天主白佛言：

src_original: vidyā yaduta prajñāpāramitā /  niruttareyaṃ bhagavān vidyā yaduta prajñāpāramitā /  anuttareyaṃ bhagavan vidyā yaduta prajñāpāramitā /  asameyaṃ bhagavan vidyā yaduta prajñāpāramitā /  asamasameyaṃ bhagavan vidyā yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
tgt_original: 「世尊！ 此般若波羅蜜多是廣大明，此般若波羅蜜多是無量明，是無上明，是最勝明，是無等明，是無等等明。

src_original: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
tgt_original: 」爾時，佛告帝釋天主言： 「如是，如是！ 憍尸迦！

src_original: mahāvidyeyaṃ kauśika yaduta prajñāpāramitā /  apramāṇeyaṃ kauśika vidyā yaduta prajñāpāramitā /  aparimāṇeyaṃ kauśika vidyā yaduta prajñāpāramitā /  asameyaṃ kauśika vidyā yaduta prajñāpāramitā /  asamasameyaṃ kauśika vidyā yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
tgt_original: 此般若波羅蜜多是廣大明，是無量明，是無上明，是最勝明，是無等明，是無等等明。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: imāṃ hi kauśika vidyāmāgamya paurvakāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ,  yaduta prajñāpāramitām /  anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante,  te 'pi kauśika imāmeva vidyāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante yaduta prajñāpāramitā /  ye 'pi kecitkauśika etarhi aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante,
tgt_original: 所有過去未來現在如來、應供、正等正覺，從是大明所出生故，諸佛阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，學是大明得成就故，乃至無量無數三千大千世界諸佛世尊，阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，皆學是般若波羅蜜多廣大明故而得成就。 憍尸迦！

src_original: te 'pi kauśika imāmeva vidyāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante yaduta prajñāpāramitām /  aham api kauśika imāmeva vidyāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho yaduta prajñāpāramitām /
tgt_original: 當知阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，從是般若波羅蜜多中來；

src_original: imāmeva kauśika vidyāmāgamya daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā loke prabhāvyante,
tgt_original: 所有十善法，因是大明故出現於世；

src_original: kathaṃ ca akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratītyasamutpādo vyavalokayitavya iti /
tgt_original: 云何是無盡法生般若波羅蜜多？ 云何是無盡法觀諸緣生？

src_original: catvāri dhyānāni bodhyaṅgasaṃprayuktāni loke prabhāvyante,  catvāryapramāṇāni bodhyaṅgasaṃprayuktāni loke prabhāvyante,  catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo bodhyaṅgaparigṛhītā loke prabhāvyante,  ṣaḍabhijñā bodhyaṅgasaṃprayuktā loke prabhāvyante,
tgt_original: 四禪定分、四無量分、四無色定分、五神通分、三十七菩提分，如是等法，皆因是大明故出現於世。

src_original: saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣā dharmā loke prabhāvyante,  saṃkṣepeṇa caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇi loke prabhāvyante,
tgt_original: 如是略說，乃至八萬四千法蘊，皆從般若波羅蜜多廣大明句所出生故。

src_original: ye kecitsubhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vivṛttā vivartante,  vivartsyante ca anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,  sarve te idamupāyakauśalyamanāgamya vivṛttā vivartante vivartsyante ca /  ye kecitsubhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā na vivṛttā na vivartante na vivartsyante ca,
tgt_original: 須菩提！

src_original: buddhajñānaṃ svayaṃbhūjñānamacintyajñānaṃ loke prabhāvyante,
tgt_original: 所有佛智，自然智，不思議智，亦復由此大明生故。

src_original: yadāpi kauśika tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke notpadyante,  tadāpi kauśika bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pūrvaśrutena prajñāpāramitāniṣyandena ye upāyakauśalyasamanvāgatā bhavanti,  te 'pi kauśika sattvānāmanukampakāḥ anukampāmupādāya imaṃ lokamāgamya daśa kuśalān karmapathān loke prabhāvayanti,
tgt_original: 若如來、應供、正等正覺不出世時，彼諸菩薩摩訶薩眾出現世間，從先所聞般若波羅蜜多，出生種種善巧方便，悲愍世間諸眾生故為作利益。

src_original: catvāri dhyānāni bodhyaṅgaviprayuktāni loke prabhāvayanti,  catvāryapramāṇāni bodhyaṅgaviprayuktāni loke prabhāvayanti /  catasra ārūpyasamāpattīrbodhyaṅgaviyuktā loke prabhāvayanti /  pañcābhijñā bodhyaṅgaviprayuktā loke prabhāvayanti /
tgt_original: 是故十善法，四禪定分，四無量分，四無色定分，五神通分，三十七菩提分如是等法，出現世間開示眾生。

src_original: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika candramaṇḍalamāgamya sarvā oṣadhīḥ tārā yathābalaṃ yathāsthāmamavabhāsayanti,  nakṣatrāṇi ca yathābalaṃ yathāsthāmamavabhāsayanti,
tgt_original: 憍尸迦！ 譬如月不出時眾星出現，如其力勢光照世間。

src_original: evameva kauśika tathāgatasyārhataṃ samyaksaṃbuddhasya atyayena saddharmasyāntardhāne  tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmanutpādāt yā kāciddharmacaryā samacaryā asamacaryā
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，如來、應供、正等正覺不出世時，所有正法亦不隱滅。 何以故？

src_original: kuśalacaryā loke prajñāyate prabhāvyate,  sarvā sā bodhisattvanirjātā bodhisattvapramāvitā (Vaidya 38)  bodhisattvopāyakauśalyapravartitā /
tgt_original: 若諸法行，若平等行，若諸善行，一一皆從諸菩薩摩訶薩所出生故，於菩薩摩訶薩善巧方便中隨順而轉。

src_original: tacca bodhisattvānāmupāyakauśalyaṃ prajñāpāramitānirjātaṃ veditavyam //
tgt_original: 是諸菩薩摩訶薩善巧方便，當知皆從般若波羅蜜多生。

src_original: sarve te imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya na vivṛttā na vivartante na vivartsyante ca anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /  evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā /  evaṃ ca akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratītyasamutpādo vyavalokayitavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 若菩薩摩訶薩不退轉於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提者，即能成就如是善巧方便，亦能了知菩薩摩訶薩如是行是行般若波羅蜜多，以如是無盡法生般若波羅蜜多，以如是無盡法觀諸緣生。 須菩提！

src_original: punaraparaṃ kauśika imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇaṃtāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ  pravartayatāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ likhatāṃ manasi kurvatāṃ
tgt_original: 「復次，憍尸迦！ 若有善男子、善女人，能於此般若波羅蜜多法門，書寫供養，受持讀誦，記念思惟，如說修行者。

src_original: samanvāharatāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā tannidānaṃ bahavo dṛṣṭadhārmikā guṇāḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyāḥ /
tgt_original: 是人以是緣故，於現世中得大利益。

src_original: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - katamaiḥ punarbhagavan dṛṣṭadhārmikairguṇaiḥ samanvāgatāste kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti ?
tgt_original: 」帝釋天主白佛言： 「世尊！ 是人於現世中當得何所利益？

src_original: bhagavānāha - na te kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā viṣamāparihāreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti,  na viṣeṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti,  na śastreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti,
tgt_original: 」佛言： 「憍尸迦！

src_original: evaṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayan na kaṃciddharmamahetukamutpadyamānaṃ samanupaśyati,  na kaṃciddharmaṃ nityaṃ vā dhruvaṃ vā śāśvataṃ vā avipariṇāmadharmakaṃ vā samanupaśyati /  na kaṃciddharmaṃ kārakaṃ vā vedakaṃ vā samanupaśyati /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩能如是觀諸緣生時，即不見有法非因緣生，亦不見有法是常、是究竟、是堅牢，亦不見法有作者、有受者。

src_original: nāgninā kālaṃ kariṣyati,  na daṇḍena kālaṃ kariṣyanti,  na paripakrameṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti /  utpannotpannāścaiṣāmupadravā rājato vā rājaputrato vā rājamantrito vā rājamahāmātrato vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāharatāṃ vā svādhyāyatāṃ vā punarevāntardhāsyanti /  teṣāṃ ca enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ punaḥ punaḥ samanvāharatāṃ vā svādhyāyatāṃ vā ye tatropasaṃkrāmeyuravatāraprekṣiṇo  'vatāragaveṣiṇo rājāno vā rājaputrā vā rājamantriṇo vā rājamahāmātrā vā,
tgt_original: 當知是善男子、善女人，不為諸毒損傷其命，不為火焚不為水溺，不遭刀劍杖苦，乃至不為他力損傷其命，又復不為王法所加。 設有是難，若能誦念般若波羅蜜多者，即得解脫。

src_original: upasaṃkrāntānāṃ ca teṣāṃ rājñāṃ vā rājaputrāṇāṃ vā rājamantriṇāṃ vā,  rājamahāmātrāṇāṃ vā ālapitukāmatā bhaviṣyati,  abhibhāṣitukāmatā bhaviṣyati,  pratisaṃmoditavyaṃ ca te maṃsyante /
tgt_original: 受持讀誦般若波羅蜜多者，若詣國王及其王子、王大臣所，時彼國王、王大臣等見已歡喜，隨其所欲一切如意。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: iyaṃ hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā sarvasattvānāmantike maitropasaṃhāreṇa maitracittatayā karuṇopasaṃhāreṇa karuṇacittatayā pratyupasthitā /
tgt_original: 憍尸迦！ 此般若波羅蜜多，於一切眾生是大慈心行、大慈行，是大悲心行，大悲行。

src_original: tasmāttarhi kauśika ye 'pi te vyālasarīsṛpakāntāramadhyagatāḥ,  teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā avatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇaḥ,  te 'pi teṣāṃ kauśika avatāraṃ na lapsyante sthāpayitvā pūrvakarmavipākam //
tgt_original: 又復，憍尸迦！ 受持讀誦此般若波羅蜜多者，於一切處，不為一切虎狼蟲獸所能傷害，乃至人非人等伺求短者，不得其便，唯除先業定應受者。

src_original: atha khalvanyatīrthyānāṃ parivrājakānāmupālambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ śataṃ tasyāṃ velāyāṃ yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmati sma /
tgt_original: 」爾時，有諸外道，於彼法中久出家者，數滿百人，來入會中，於佛世尊欲生惱亂。

src_original: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro dūrata eva āgacchatastānanyatīrthyān parivrājakān dṛṣṭvā
tgt_original: 是時，帝釋天主遠見此人漸近佛會。

src_original: teṣāṃ cittāni vyavalokya evaṃ cintayāmāsa - ime khalu anyatīrthyāḥ parivrājakā upālambhābhiprāyā  yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmanti sma /  yannvahaṃ yāvanmātro mayāṃ bhagavato 'ntikādasyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pradeśa udgṛhītaḥ,  tāvanmātraṃ smṛtyā samanvāhareyaṃ svādhyāyeyaṃ pravartayeyam,
tgt_original: 即時天主觀察彼心，知其所欲而作是念：

src_original: yathaite 'nyatīrthāḥ parivrājakā bhagavantaṃ nopasaṃkrāmeyuḥ /
tgt_original: 「此諸外道，今來佛會欲生惱亂。

src_original: evamasyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā bhāṣyamāṇāyā nāntarāyaḥ syāditi /  atha khalu śakro devānāmindro yāvanmātro bhagavato 'ntikādasyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pradeśaḥ udgṛhītaḥ,  tāvanmātraṃ smṛtyā samanvāharati sma,  svādhyāyati sma,  pravartayati sma /
tgt_original: 我先從佛所受般若波羅蜜多法門，宜應誦念。 」帝釋天主作是思惟已，即誦般若波羅蜜多法門。

src_original: atha te 'nyatīrthāḥ parivrājakā dūrāddūrataraṃ bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tenaiva dvāreṇa tenaiva mārgeṇa punareva niṣkrāntāḥ /
tgt_original: 時諸外道既入會中，遠見世尊，是時各各右繞世尊已，即離佛會復道而還。

src_original: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitadabhūt (Vaidya 39)
tgt_original: 爾時，尊者舍利子即作是念：

src_original: - kimatra kāraṇaṃ yena ime 'nyatīrthyāḥ parivrājakā dūrāddūrataraṃ bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tenaiva dvāreṇa tenaiva mārgeṇa punareva niṣkrāntāḥ?
tgt_original: 「云何此諸外道來入會中，向佛世尊右繞而退？

src_original: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya imamevaṃrūpaṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya  āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - śakreṇa śāriputra devānāmindreṇa teṣāmanyatīrthyānāṃ  parivrājakānāmupālambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ cittāni vyavalokya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā smṛtyā
tgt_original: 」是時，世尊知舍利子心所思念，即告尊者舍利子言：

src_original: iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmakṣayābhinirhāreṇa abhinirharato 'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ pratītyasamutpādavyavalokanā  yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāmakṣayābhinirhāreṇa abhinirharan pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayati,
tgt_original: 須菩提！ 菩薩摩訶薩如是行般若波羅蜜多時，念無盡法，如理出生般若波羅蜜多。

src_original: samanvāhṛtā svādhyāyitā pravartitā,  teṣāmanyatīrthyānāṃ parivrājakānāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāṃ nivartanārtham,
tgt_original: 「汝今當知彼諸外道，於彼法中而各出家，今來佛會欲生破壞違諍損惱。

src_original: yathā asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā bhāṣyamāṇāyā ete 'nyatīrthyāḥ parivrājakā nopasaṃkrāmeyuriti,  māntarāyaṃ kārṣuḥ prajñāpāramitāyā bhāṣyamāṇāyā iti /  mayā ca śakrasya devānāmindrasyābhyanujñātam /
tgt_original: 帝釋天主以誦般若波羅蜜多故，彼諸外道自生慚退。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ?  nāhaṃ śāriputra teṣāmanyatīrthyānāṃ parivrājakānāmekasyāpi śuklaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi /  sarve te śāriputra upālambhābhiprāyāḥ pratihatacittā upasaṃkramitukāmā abhūvan //
tgt_original: 舍利子！ 是故當知，般若波羅蜜多法門有大威力，能除一切外道邪惡。

src_original: atha khalu mārasya pāpīyasya etadabhūt - imāstathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya catasraḥ parṣadaḥ saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣaṇṇāstathāgatasya saṃmukhībhūtāḥ  ime ca kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrāḥ saṃmukhībhūtāḥ /
tgt_original: 」爾時，復有諸惡魔眾咸作是念： 「今如來、應供、正等正覺，與其四眾并欲、色界諸天子等而共集會。

src_original: niyatamatra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyākariṣyante 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /  yannvahamupasaṃkrāmeyaṃ vicakṣuḥkaraṇāyeti /
tgt_original: 彼佛世尊與諸菩薩摩訶薩授阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記，我等今者宜應往彼。

src_original: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyāṃścaturaṅgabalakāyamabhinirmāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmati sma /
tgt_original: 」時諸魔眾作是念已，即化四兵種種莊嚴詣於佛所。

src_original: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - māro batāyaṃ pāpīyāṃścaturaṅgabalakāyamabhinirmāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmati sma /  yaścāyaṃ caturaṅgasya balakāyasya vyūhaḥ,
tgt_original: 是時帝釋天主，見是四兵嚴整妙好來入佛會。 即作是念：

src_original: nāyaṃ rājño bimbisārasya caturaṅgasya balakāyasya vyūhaḥ,  nāpi rājñaḥ prasenajitaścaturaṅgasya balakāyasya vyūhaḥ,  nāpi śākyānāṃ caturaṅgasya balakāyasya vyūhaḥ,  nāpi licchavīnāṃ caturaṅgasya balakāyasya vyūhaḥ,  yo 'yaṃ māreṇa pāpīyasā abhinirmitaḥ /
tgt_original: 「此四兵眾莊嚴殊麗，非彼頻婆娑羅王之所有，亦非勝軍大王所有，又非諸餘國王所有，亦復非其長者子有，此即是彼諸惡魔眾化現故爾。

src_original: samanubaddho dīrgharātraṃ māraḥ pāpīyān bhagavato 'vatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī,  sattvānāṃ ca viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ /  yannvahamimāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ smṛtyā samanvāhareyaṃ svādhyāyeyaṃ pravartayeyamiti /
tgt_original: 何以故？ 彼諸魔眾，於長夜中違背佛法，伺求其短欲生破壞，我今宜應誦佛所受般若波羅蜜多法門。

src_original: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra imāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ smṛtyā samanvāharati sma svādhyāyati sma pravartayati sma /  yathā yathā ca śakro devānāmindra imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ smṛtyā samanvāharati sma svādhyāyati sma pravartayati sma,
tgt_original: 」帝釋天主作是念已，即誦般若波羅蜜多法門。

src_original: tathā tathā māraḥ pāpīyāṃstenaiva mārgeṇa punareva pratyudāvṛttaḥ //
tgt_original: 彼諸魔眾，即時各各攝其化現復道而還。

src_original: atha khalu trāyastriṃśatkāyikā devaputrā divyāni māndārapuṣpāṇyabhinirmāya vihāyasā antarīkṣagatā yena bhagavāṃstenābhyavakiranti sma,
tgt_original: 爾時，三十三天子眾，即於會中，化現無數天曼陀羅華等種種妙華，散於佛上。 其所散華，住虛空中。

src_original: yena bhagavāṃstena tāni divyāni māndāravapuṣpāṇyabhiprakiranti sma,
tgt_original: 時諸天子眾散妙華已，作如是言：

src_original: tasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpaṃ samanupaśyati,  na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān,  na vijñānaṃ samanupaśyati,  evaṃ na saṃskārānna vijñānaṃ na nāmarūpaṃ na ṣaḍāyatanaṃ na sparśaṃ na vedanāṃ na  tṛṣṇāṃ nopādānaṃ na bhavaṃ na jātiṃ na jarāmaraṇaṃ na śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsān samanupaśyati /
tgt_original: 以如是無盡法觀諸緣生時，即不見色，不見受、想、行、識，亦復不見無明、行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生老死憂悲苦惱等。

src_original: evaṃ codānamudānayanti sma - cirasya bateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāmupāvṛtteti /
tgt_original: 「願此般若波羅蜜多正法久住世間，與閻浮提眾生作大利益。

src_original: punareva ca divyāni māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenābhyavakiranti sma,
tgt_original: 」發是言已重復散華，散已又言：

src_original: abhiprakiranti sma /  evaṃ cāvocan - ye kecidbhagavan sattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyante bhāvayiṣyanti,
tgt_original: 「唯願一切眾生，於此般若波羅蜜多法門，宣布演說如說修行。

src_original: na teṣāṃ māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā avatāraṃ lapsyante /  na te bhagavan sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena (Vaidya 40)  ye imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti,
tgt_original: 一切魔及魔天人與非人，伺求短者，不得其便，普令眾生善根具足。
